author: मैथिली 🇮🇳🚩
text:
सब सुख लहै तुम्हारी सरना 
तुम रक्षक काहू को डरना
Those who take refuge in you enjoy all happiness. 
If you are the protector, then what is there to fear?
राम राम 🙏

Please keep my son in your prayers his boards are commencing from today 🙏 https://t.co/lFpFw36ryk
